caption: Relating to border protection agreements between this state and the United Mexican States.
undersanding:
Summary:
This bill authorizes the Texas governor to establish border protection agreements with Mexico and its states. It requires all foreign individuals to enter Texas through legal ports of entry. While the bill doesn't specifically target Chinese immigrants, it affects all foreign nationals entering Texas. Chinese visitors or immigrants must ensure they enter Texas through official ports of entry.

中文翻译：
该法案授权德克萨斯州州长与墨西哥及其各州建立边境保护协议。法案要求所有外国人必须通过合法入境口岸进入德克萨斯州。虽然该法案并非专门针对中国移民，但会影响所有进入德克萨斯州的外国公民。中国访客或移民必须确保通过官方入境口岸进入德克萨斯州。
